notWashed.text: Have you noticed the gum on your ass?
You have to be more careful, since you don't do the washing...

talked.text: Do you want to talk about anything else?

choices1.text: Guille invited me to go to his place this Saturday.

goMatch.text: I've told him I'll go, so I wont't be home this Saturday afternoon.

dontGoMatch.text: I've told him no, too many people I don't trust.

askMatch.text: I've told him I needed to ask you first.

askMatchReply.text: You're allowed to go. I'll ask your mother just in case.

alisonWarn.text: She warned me about Alex wanting to pull a prank on me.

aboutGumWashed.text: Today I've ended up with a gum stuck to my ass.
I've tried to remove it using water and soap, but it was even worse.
Most of the class laughed at me.

aboutGumNotWashed.text: About the gum... I don't know how it happened.
Most of the class laughed at me.

dadGumNotWashed.text: Oh honey, you need to look where you place your ass before sitting.

maria.text: But it seems she doesn't speak to anyone else.

alex.text: I would say he has a problem with me since the first day.
But I don't know exactly why.

prank.text: And today he wanted to pull a prank on me.

ask.text: He was upset with me for sitting on his chair.
I tried to make peace with him.
But by the way he talked to me, I think he's going to keep looking for trouble.

askReply.text: If you have any problem with him, don't hesitate to tell me.
We'll talk to your teacher if we need to.

distrust.text: He makes me want to kick his bloody ass.

distrustReply.text: If I need to go and talk to him, let me know.
Or if you're in trouble, just talk to your teacher.

choices4.text: I'm going to my room. There're some stuff I need to do.
